# [Interview #1181: Little City Books-AU Tour, Entry #3](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1181#3)

#### Ted Herman

Why is Nazh short for Nazrilof?

#### Brandon Sanderson

It is a nickname.

#### Footnote

The silent h is puzzling.
